lemma REFL_TC_CONJ: fixes R R' :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> bool" and P x y assumes "reflexive R'" "\<forall>x y. P x \<and> P y \<longrightarrow> (R' x y \<longrightarrow> R x y)" "\<not>(R\<^sup>+\<^sup>+ x y)" shows "(\<not>(R'\<^sup>+\<^sup>+ x y) \<or> (\<exists>z. \<not>P z \<and> (R')\<^sup>+\<^sup>+ x z \<and> (R')\<^sup>+\<^sup>+ z y))"
